g.text: Whereas the geometric perturbations caused by placing the
BCA crystal under pressure are easy to observe, a subtle
computational analysis is required to determine the bond type
and to illuminate the interplay between chemical bonds and
Several methods for analyzing electron charge densities have
been proposed in the literature: topological analysis,
and the use of molecular scalar
Among the latter, the density overlap region
) is a speciﬁc and ideally suited example
because it reveals both covalent and noncovalent interactions
